entry.title: [PATCH] Add spellcheck tool (requires `aspell`), also spellcheck.
entry.summary: In a post on the Lightning-dev forum, ZmnSCPxj shared a patch for lightning-rfc on Github. However, Rusty, another user, informed that the patch was line-wrapped, whitespace-mangled, and not applicable. Rusty took it upon himself to unmangle the patch and work through all the spelling errors before adding a Travis check against introducing new ones. The final result can be viewed on the Github pull request page numbered 153.
